# Some data (FDI .green[net] inflow, USD, logged scale)

.center[

```{r, fig.width=18, cache=TRUE}

library(tidyverse)
library(WDI)


var = c(#'FDI.out' = 'BM.KLT.DINV.CD.WD',
        #'FDI.in' = 'BX.KLT.DINV.CD.WD',
        'GDPpc' = 'NY.GDP.PCAP.KD',
        'FDI.GDP' = 'BX.KLT.DINV.WD.GD.ZS',
        'FDI' = 'BN.KLT.DINV.CD') # BX.KLT.DINV.CD.WD

wdi <- WDI(indicator=var,
           start=1980,
           country = 'all',
           end=2020,
           extra=TRUE)

#wdi %>%
#  mutate(
#    lnFDI.out = log(FDI.out, na.rm=T),
#    lnFDI.in = log(FDI.in, na.rm=T)
#  )

wdi %>% 
  drop_na(GDPpc) %>%
  mutate(developed = 
           case_when(GDPpc > 25000 ~ "developed",
                     GDPpc < 25000 ~ "underdeveloped"
                     )) -> wdi2

wdi2 %>% 
  mutate(lnFDI = log10(abs(FDI + 1))) %>%
  filter(FDI !=0) %>%
  mutate(lnFDI = ifelse(FDI<0, lnFDI*(-1), lnFDI)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(year, lnFDI, color=developed)) +
  geom_point(alpha=0.1,size=2) +
  geom_smooth(alpha=0.25, size=3) +
  labs(x="Year",
       y="Gross FDI net inflow") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  scale_color_manual(values=c("red", "blue")) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=13),
        axis.text=element_text(size=15),
        axis.title=element_text(size=15))

```
]

# Some data (FDI, per GDP)

.center[

```{r echo=F, message=F, error=F, warning=F, fig.width=18, cache=TRUE}
wdi2 %>%
  filter(FDI.GDP<150) %>%
  ggplot(aes(year, FDI.GDP, color=developed)) +
  geom_point(alpha=0.1,size=2) +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_smooth(alpha=0.25, size=3) +
  labs(x="Year",
       y="FDI inflow, % GDP") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  scale_color_manual(values=c("red", "blue")) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=20),
        axis.text=element_text(size=15),
        axis.title=element_text(size=15))
```
]
